name: Institut für Kommunikation in sozialen Medien
goal: ikosom was created in 2011. It has since then worked with a variety of clients, both private clients, corporations, NGOs, Incubators, regional, national and international governmental organizations and institutions. We regularly participate in Project Calls on the European Level, for instance in Interreg, Erasmus and EP Programmes. We are also members of advisory groups to the European Commission. We focus on the development of policy recommendations in various field of digital technology, especially alternative finance, crowdfunding and peer-to-peer-lending.
